ComicInfo.Title: Pax Cybertronia
ComicInfo.Summary: bi-weekly September- December 2011Pax Cybertronia: In the future, peace has finally come to Cybertron after so many millenia of conflict. Only Ironhide and Alpha Trion are the only original Autobots left alongside a new generation, as Ironhide and Alpha speak of the peace that has finally come, as the new generation wants to hear tales of the Autobots' triumphs vs. Mgatron and the Decepticons. In the end, Ironhide is asked if Megatron ever returned would he be ready to battle him once more, and he responds he would if it came to pass.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev36 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-03-22 17:22:12. [Issue ID 900432]
